column3: Latest;Svay Rieng: The President of the Cambodian  Youth Federation of Cambodia in Svay Rieng Province
column6: oversaw the training of children on how to save themselves when drowning.------Under the theme of “Reduce the risk of drowning in children NO KIDS DROWN” the swimming lessons took place in Svay Rieng City.------*Drownings are a common cause of death for children and teenagers
column7: with many not knowing how to swim or what to do when in a dangerous situation in water. ------Rasmei
